entry.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Backend: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

entry.title: fistix/stripe-meta-paytrack: stripe-meta-paytrack is a lightweight service that listens to Stripe payment webhooks and forwards successful purchase events to Metaâ€™s Conversion API. It helps track conversions reliably by syncing Stripe payments with Meta Events Manager, enabling better ad performance tracking and attribution.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
